complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of the WorkoutTimer component into subtasks covering timer logic, UI components, audio notifications, persistence, and background functionality
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Timer implementation requires handling multiple timer types, state management, audio integration, and background processing. Complexity comes from managing different timer modes, persistence across page refreshes, and background functionality when app is minimized.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement P90X Workout Templates Data and Services
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of P90X workout templates into subtasks covering data structure, template creation, validation, versioning, and service layer implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Large scope requiring detailed data modeling for multiple workout types, complex template structures, versioning system, and comprehensive validation. High data accuracy requirements and intricate relationships between exercises and templates.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Exercise Library Data and Services
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of the exercise library into subtasks covering data structure, search functionality, categorization, and service layer implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires comprehensive data modeling, search optimization, and complex categorization. Large dataset management and relationship handling between exercises and templates adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the authentication frontend implementation into subtasks covering form components, validation, state management, and protected routes
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to multiple authentication flows and security requirements. Standard patterns exist for most functionality, but requires careful implementation of token management and state handling.
